    • Method Detail

      • handleConflict

        @ExceptionHandler(value=CouldNotFindNoteException.class)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ErrorInfo> handleConflict(CouldNotFindNoteException ex)
        Handles conflicts arising from not finding a note. Returns a message and the id of the note from a CouldNotFindNoteException instance.
        Parameters:
        ex - The exception class instance.
        Returns:
        An ErrorInfo response entity and a 404 status code.

      • handleConflict

        @ExceptionHandler(value=NoNotesExistException.class)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ErrorInfo> handleConflict(NoNotesExistException ex)
        Handles conflicts arising from not finding any notes in the database. Returns a 404 status code and an error message.
        Parameters:
        ex - The NoNotesExistException instance
        Returns:
        A Response Entity containing an error message.
